sentences.en: An atrocious accident happened this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天上午发生了一起使人震惊的事故.

sentences.en: Churches and altars were polluted by atrocious murders ( Edward Gibbon )
sentences.cn: 教堂和圣坛被凶残的谋杀亵渎了 ( 爱德华吉本 )

sentences.en: Her attendance record is atrocious; she missed 10 days last month.
sentences.cn: 她出勤率太低了; 她上个月有10天没来.

sentences.en: I began to feel atrocious toward those fellows.
sentences.cn: 我对这些家伙感到愤懑.
天气真糟透了,是 吧 ?

sentences.en: It is in moments of panic that cruelty becomes most wide - spread and most atrocious.
sentences.cn: 残忍在惊恐中表现得最为广泛凶暴.

sentences.en: She speaks French with an atrocious accent.
sentences.cn: 她讲法语带有很难听的口音。

sentences.en: The atrocious name grated harshly on my ear.
sentences.cn: 这十恶不赦的名字,在我听来非常刺耳.

sentences.en: The judge said he had committed atrocious crimes against women.
sentences.cn: 法官说他对妇女犯下了滔天罪行。

sentences.en: The record of cross - border carmaking mergers atrocious.
sentences.cn: 跨国的汽车厂商合并总是龃龉不断.

sentences.en: The treatment of the prisoners by their captors is atrocious and breaks all international laws.
sentences.cn: 俘获者对待囚犯异常凶残，违反一切国际法律。
我们在很恶劣的环境下工作.

trans.tran_en: If you describe someone's behaviour or their actions as atrocious, you mean that it is unacceptable because it is extremely violent or cruel
